com.pega.pegarules.pub.generator

Class FirstUseAssemblerException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • com.pega.pegarules.pub.PRException
          • com.pega.pegarules.pub.generator.FirstUseAssemblerException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class FirstUseAssemblerException
extends PRException
    The FirstUseAssemblerException class is thrown for any unrecoverable error during First-Use Assembly runtime processing. This class does not extend one of the PegaRULES Throwable classes, so it does not affect the current ProcessingStatus. When the Exception is caught, it can be handled 'silently' or rethrown as a PegaRULES Throwable to set the status.
    See Also:
